data.name: Weapons of the Warrior Deck Unlock
data.detailed_description: Gideon Jura’s fully unlocked “Weapons of the Warrior” white deck. Gideon Jura seeks to redeem his misspent youth by fighting for the cause of the meek on any world he encounters. A master of melee and a tireless weapon of justice, he’ll stride into even a hopeless battle before he lets anyone harm those in his charge. (Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play. Requires Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers. Full versions of all Expansion Pack game add-ons required to access all cards.)
data.about_the_game: Gideon Jura’s fully unlocked “Weapons of the Warrior” white deck. Gideon Jura seeks to redeem his misspent youth by fighting for the cause of the meek on any world he encounters. A master of melee and a tireless weapon of justice, he’ll stride into even a hopeless battle before he lets anyone harm those in his charge. (Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play. Requires Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers. Full versions of all Expansion Pack game add-ons required to access all cards.)
data.short_description: Gideon Jura’s fully unlocked “Weapons of the Warrior” white deck. Gideon Jura seeks to redeem his misspent youth by fighting for the cause of the meek on any world he encounters. A master of melee and a tireless weapon of justice, he’ll stride into even a hopeless battle before he lets anyone harm those in his charge.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows XP with Service Pack 3
  • Processor: 2GHz CPU (Pentium 4 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 1GB RAM (2GB for Vista)
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c or later
  • Hard Drive: 700MB
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Video: 256MB VRAM GPU capable of Pixel Shader 3 or better
